HeroSection.description: Compare cloud services and choose the best secure cloud storage for you.

features.encryption_at_rest_and_in_transit: Encryption at rest and in transit

FeatureSection.title: Why choose Internxt?
FeatureSection.description: Internxt creates private and secure cloud services designed to put you, the user, back in charge of your data. Protecting your files and your fundamental right to privacy, all Internxt services are built from the ground up for unparalleled safety and security.

InfoSection.title: Secure cloud storage with unmatched privacy
InfoSection.description: What makes Internxt so special? We’re a tight-knit team of professionals completely dedicated to protecting you online. Everything we do and every decision we make is centered on protecting your data from being exploited.

cards.title: Private by design
cards.description: We don’t store passwords or user data and all of your data is encrypted in-transit and at-rest. Internxt puts you in full control of your files. Your data is your business. Protecting it is ours.

cards.title: Uncompromising security
cards.description: Your files are end-to-end encrypted before ever leaving your device. Thanks to zero-knowledge AES-256 encryption, you are the absolutely only one with access to your data.

cards.title: Open source and transparent
cards.description: We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.

cards.title: Independently verified
cards.description: We’re wholly GDPR compliant and 100% safe, but don’t take our word for it. Internxt has been independently audited and verified by Europe’s leading penetration testing company, Securitum.

ThirdFeaturesSection.title: Get up to 10GB for free!
ThirdFeaturesSection.description: Create your free account now and get full access to our suite of online privacy services.

cards.name: Eva W.
cards.review: Internxt is a convenient cloud storage service for budget-conscious clients. It has a streamlined interface and a reliable support team, which makes it a great option for those who need to store their files securely.

cards.name: Cristian M.
cards.review: The best encrypted Dropbox alternative. Overall: We needed an alternative that allowed us to store client files and work (social media files) and as Internxt is GDPR friendly fit perfectly for us!

cards.name: Josep C.
cards.review: I've been using Google Drive for several years, but I needed an alternative which granted me the privacy of my data. Something that Google or other well known platforms can't do. That's why I moved to Internxt.

cards.name: Pat G.
cards.review: I am storing files for a non-profit organization and working with Internxt was marvelous! This drive was very easy to use. I didn't have to do anything but upload and download. The program and drive did the rest!

cards.name: Luca C.
cards.review: The future of cloud storage! Love the fact that finally we have an affordable encrypted and secure cloud storage software that also has a very cool look and is user-friendly.

cards.name: Binet S.
cards.review: Fast, reliable, and inexpensive - best components of any product! The ample storage space is definitely appreciated! I have enough of space to save all of my photos and files. I also like how simple it is to share files.

faq.question: What is the most secure cloud storage service?
answer: If you compare Internxt with all the other services, you will find that Internxt is the most private and secure alternative to Google Drive, Dropbox, and other popular services.

CtaSection.title: Safety is only a click away
CtaSection.description: Protect your personal data with Internxt's privacy suite.
